text.section: In this Part III of this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Contract claim" means a claim that relates to a procurement contract.
"Contract claim" includes a claim about the performance, breach, modification, or termination of the procurement contract.
"Protest" means a complaint that relates to the formation of a procurement contract.

"Protest" includes a complaint about:
the qualifications of a bidder or offeror; or
the determination of the successful bidder or offeror.
